headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Beats Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 11.67% and 3.17%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Beats Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: FirstEnergy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: AKRON, Ohio (AP) — FirstEnergy Corp. FE) on Wednesday reported first-quarter net income of $360 million. On a per-share basis, the Akron, Ohio-based company said it had net income of 62 cents.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: AKRON, Ohio (AP) — FirstEnergy Corp. FE) on Wednesday reported first-quarter net income of $360 million. On a per-share basis, the Akron, Ohio-based company said it had net income of 62 cents.

headline: FirstEnergy Announces First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today reported first quarter 2025 GAAP earnings of $360 million, or $0.62 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $3.8 billion. This compares to first quarter 2024 GAAP earnings of $253 million, or $0.44 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $3.3 billion. GAAP results include the impact of special items listed below.
